1370: Alard moved to Den Hof.D.5 after marriage.
Got married to Mabelie at age 27 in 1370.
1372: Had a son with Mabelie, Boidin, at age 29.
1373: Had a son with Mabelie, Claward, at age 30.
1374: Had a son with Mabelie, Snellard, at age 31.
1375: Lost his wife Mabelie while she was giving birth to Stoethoute in 1375.
Became caretaker of Boidin, Claward, Snellard, Stoethoute at age 33.
1380: Lost son Boidin when Boidin was 9 years old.
Lost son Stoethoute when Stoethoute was 6 years old.
